definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: prob. return, go about, repeat, do again (Ar. 9wd, 9a0da return, do again IV. resotre, also say again, iterate, 9a0dah;un habit ; Eth. 9od: turn about, surround, 9awada: circuit, circle; Syr. Pa. 9ayed accustom, Ethpe. Aph. be accustomed, 9yodo0 usage, ceremong, 9iydo0 festival (Brock), whence ar. 9iyda id., as loan-word, Frä:276; Palm. [[עידא]] usage Lzb:337 Cook:90; NH [[עֵד]], and esp. [[עֵדוּת]] = BH, also [[עִיד]] festival, Targum [[עִידָא]]; cf. prob. As. Shaph. usû-id, he he solemnly affirmed Dl:HWB 32);—only intens. :

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: surround (cf. Eth.), Pf. 3 ms. sf. [[עִוְּדֻנִי]] Ps 119:61 (cf. [[סְבָבוּנִי]] Ps 18:6).

definitions.title: Pōl‘ēl,
definitions.body: restore, relieve (cf. Ar. IV.), Impf. 3 ms. [[יְעוֹדֵד]], c. acc. pers. Ps 146:9 (‖[[שָׁמַר]], opp. [[עִוֵּת]]), Ps 147:6 (opp. [[הִשְׁפִּיל]]).

definitions.title: Hithpōl.
definitions.body: be restored, Impf. 1 pl. [[וַנִּתְעוֹדָָּד]] Ps 20:9 ( + [[קוּס]], opp. [[נׇפֵל]]; LXX a)nwrqw/qhmen.
